channel.title: [DELTA]Adding Admin Restrictions[DELTA]
channel.description: Can someone help me make it so on my delta source admins cannot trade, drop, attack other players, lose items on death, or duel. I have searched everywhere and found nothing. Please help ASAP. Thanks, Jhost

item.title: [DELTA]Adding Admin Restrictions[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

For attacking players do this…

AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); client AttackingOn2 = (client)server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if(AttackingOn2.playerRights <= 2) { sM("Sorry, no fighting for you bro."); break; }
Add that under the first bracket. Should work, let me know I may be missing a piece of code.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Adding Admin Restrictions[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:4, topic:339004”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=435389.msg3197331#msg3197331 date=1272924794]

just make an else if for it.

} else if (playerRights == 1) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 2) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 4) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 3) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); }

Something like that.

Lol?
All you did was do else if the player rights, and a send message.
[/quote]

No, he’s saying you add onto that code but that’s a starter for the code (Notice the else if)[/quote]
As said at the top. . .
“HE HAD NOTHING completed with it. . .”
Don’t even know where to put anything…

Read full topic

just make an else if for it.

} else if (playerRights == 1) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 2) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 4) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 3) { sM("No nigga, gtfo."); }

Something like that.

That code snippet is awful. :eek:
[/quote]

I’ll censor it for you.

} else if (playerRights == 1) { sM("No N Word, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 2) { sM("No N Word, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 4) { sM("No N Word, gtfo."); } else if (playerRights == 3) { sM("No N Word, gtfo."); }

Better?[/quote]

Not even a bit. Just so you know, I didn’t say it was awful because it said ‘nigger’ in it.

Read full topic
